text: So, in the Internet History Podcast, I talked a bit about the idea of "working together," and somewhat unfairly used Marco Arment as an example of someone who wasn't receptive to my new ideas. I recorded this 10-minute podcast to explain what I had in mind, generally, not about specific products (it was a long time ago, the opportunity long-since passed). Most of the time when you knock on the door saying here's a free idea, people think you want something. But sometimes it goes somewhere and that's when really interesting stuff happens. This is worth talking about.
